transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good evening sir.
Customer: Good evening, good evening ji. Haan ji, speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan, okay, okay ma'am. Mere ko IndiaMART mein ye Hyderabad ka calls naya purana mein aane wala hai actually.
Customer: Wo lead nahi le nahi le pa raha abhi present.
Executive: Kaunse location ki chahiye sir aapko?
Customer: Hyderabad, Hyderabad ka.
Executive: Hyderabad location ki chahiye?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay, toh aap filter vagaira laga ke check kar rahe hain?
Customer: Filter, haan filter mein check kar raha hu. But Hyderabad dikh raha hai. Wo usse lead okay karke jaana hai toh nahi nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Click karte toh sold out show ho rahi hogi aapko maybe.
Customer: Aisa dikh raha hai. Sold out ya dusra koi matlab dikh raha hai.
Executive: Sold out ka sir sold out main main batati hu. Sold out ka sir kaise rehta hai jaise ek buylead hai aapke alawa char log aur consume kar sakte hain. Minimum ek buylead paanch log consume kar sakte hain. Theek hai? Jaise hi paanch log consume kar lete hain na wo sold out ho jaati hai. Toh ho sakta hai aapke kisi competitor ne wo buylead pehle hi consume kar li hogi paanch logon ne jiski wajah se aap consume nahi kar pa rahe hain.
Customer: Ek minute, do minute, teen minute mein?
Executive: Sir actually kya hai aapke is ispe jo aapka jo categories vagaira hai high troll category hai sir yaha pe bahut competition hai iske aapke jo hai profile usme products mein. Toh wahi reason ho sakta hai ki isi wajah se jo hai sold out jaldi ho jaati hai. Aur kuch jaise aapko hai minimum Hyderabad ki chahiye waise aur bhi hamare suppliers hain IndiaMART pe jinko Hyderabad ki chahiye hoti hai. Toh yahi reason hota hai kyunki kuch jo badi badi companies hain unhone toh kya kar rakha hai ki bhai ek employee jo hai wo hire kar rakha hai Hyderabad ka alag Hyderabad mein alag deta hai mere ko extra amount daal ke Hyderabad mein leta hai.
Executive: Extra amount daal ke matlab?
Executive: Nahi sir usme kya rehta hai na fir wo apna jo hai wo bada matlab package hota hai jisme sirf aapki aapke jo wo hai area matlab jisme aap Hyderabad mein karna chahte hain city wise fir aapki listing waha pe ho jayegi Hyderabad mein. Toh koi aur bhi log search karenge ya fir Hyderabad ke bhi log search karenge toh aapki company unko upar dikhegi toh wo toh hamara premium package hota hai IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan toh usme kya rehta hai ki bhai aapki listing Hyderabad mein hi rahegi fir.
Customer: Okay. Hyderabad ka hamara aadmi hai aur listing address hai udhar sabhi deta hu. Hyderabad mein kaisa mere ko pehla ye consume karne ke baad nahi.
Customer: Pehla aana kya kaisa aana hai ek baar dekho aap.
Executive: Sir usme toh yahi hai ki bhai main yahi aapko bolungi ki bhai aap buyleads vagaira toh matlab aap bol rahe hain na jaldi sold out ho jaati hai toh uska reason sir yahi hai competition. Agar aapko ye hai ki aapko minimum karna hi sirf Hyderabad mein deal hai toh uske liye toh aapko sirf main aapko yahi suggest karungi jo hamara package hai premium package aap uspe agar focus karenge toh aapka jo listing hai Hyderabad mein badhegi. Toh agar koi bhi search karega kyunki aapke wo company ke aage likha hua aa jayega deals in Hyderabad. Jab bhi koi buyer aapki product search karega. Haan toh wo wahi hai usme sir wahi hai ki bhai expense thoda matlab jyada rehta hai. Baki ek baar main aapko batati hu kaisa rahega ek second rukiye.
Customer: Abhi item nahi hai, do teen item hai bas.
Executive: Ek second sir, ek second rukiye.
Executive: Sir Hyderabad ka hi hai na sir apna?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay okay ek second. Aapke paas na waiting pe call aa raha hoga ek. Aap ek baar wo jo hai wo kariye. Pick kariye aapke paas waiting pe aa raha hoga.
Customer: Mere ko waiting pe aa raha hai?
Executive: Haan ji waiting pe aayega ek baar dobara ek baar check kariye aayega aapke paas.
Customer: Waiting aapka baat phone ka baat kar raha na?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir waiting pe aayega aap uthaiye unka phone manager baat kar rahe wo meri wo aapko acche se explain kar payenge.
Executive: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to get buyleads for Hyderabad location.

- Buyleads are getting sold out quickly.



Resolution:

- Explained about buyleads consumption process.

- Suggested premium package for Hyderabad listing.

- Informed about high competition in the category.

- Asked to pick up the call from manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive's manager will explain the process.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, hyderabad, premium package
